channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NM

item.title: Report X-2024010516
item.description:
Report X-2024010516

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-26T15:11:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-02
  • City: BELEN
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: GATX 74170 was found to be leaking from the BOV. It is a slight drip in the early morning when it is the coldest. The secondary containment nozzle/plug was found to be missing when it arrived in the Belen, NM yard. Have been awaiting parts from the shipper to repair the car. Leak is being contained with a plastic bag until repairs can be made to the car.
